LanguageData.RC2_SunshineAddiction.label: sunshine addiction
LanguageData.RC2_SunshineAddiction.description: Sunshine has built up in the pawn's system and has become reliant on its euphoria. Withdrawal will cause the pawn to wander confused commonly.
LanguageData.RC2_SunshineHigh.label: walking on sunshine
LanguageData.RC2_SunshineHigh.description: Sunshine reduces senses and mental competence, but ensures a strong euphoria when in their system.
LanguageData.RC2_SunshineTolerance.label: sunshinetolerance
LanguageData.RC2_SunshineTolerance.description: Sunshine has built up in their system, causing the pawn to have issues separating the euphoria and reality. Mental breaks can happen and can be very dangerous.
LanguageData.RC2_SunshineTolerance.stages.large.label: large
